class.name: DotnetTestStep
class.description: A [dotnet test step](https://github.com/JetBrains/teamcity-dotnet-plugin) to run .NET CLI command

function.name: dotnetTest
function.description: Adds a [dotnet test step](https://github.com/JetBrains/teamcity-dotnet-plugin) to run .NET CLI command @see DotnetTestStep

param.name: paths
param.description: Specify paths to projects and solutions. Wildcards are supported.

param.name: excludedPaths
param.description: Specify paths to excluded projects. Wildcards are supported.

param.name: teamcity.build.workingDir
param.description: [Build working directory](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?Build+Working+Directory) for script, specify it if it is different from the [checkout directory](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?Build+Checkout+Directory).

param.name: outputDir
param.description: The directory where to find the binaries to be run.

param.name: skipBuild
param.description: Do not build the project before testing

param.name: singleSession
param.description: Whether TeamCity should run tests in a single session

param.name: test.settingsFile
param.description: Run tests that match the given expression.

param.name: test.retry.maxRetries
param.description: Rerun failed tests until they pass or until the maximum number of attempts is reached.

param.name: args
param.description: Enter additional command line parameters for dotnet test.

param.name: required.sdk
param.description: .NET SDK versions separated by semicolon to be required on agents.

example.description: Runs [`dotnet test`](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/core/tools/dotnet-test) command for all the solution files in the checkout directory. Does not try to build the project, assumes this is already done by some previous step.

Runs [`dotnet test`](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/core/tools/dotnet-test) for the MyProject.sln solution file. Collects code coverage with help of [JetBrains DotCover](https://www.jetbrains.com/dotcover/) for the specified assemblies.
Runs [`dotnet test`](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/core/tools/dotnet-test) for the specified test assemblies.
